DOC.HEADLINE: FILIPINO EVENT
DOC.TEXT: The Filipino American Chamber_of_Commerce will present " Sweet Sounds and Sights of Home : Philippine Culture in Los Angeles " on Friday at the Philippine Arts and Trade Center , 1660 Hillhurst Ave . The free event , from 6 to 8 p.m. , will feature food , crafts , music and entertainment . It is sponsored by Tatak Pilipino in celebration of the 16th annual Asian Pacific American Heritage Month . The event is open_to the public , but reservations are requested . Information and reservations : ( 213 ) 962-8590 .
